QuestData.Title: Recipe for Disaster
QuestData.Description: Did you see that explosion I made? I must have flown 10 inches off the ground!$b$bI've just got to get Zanzil's recipe so I can find out why it did that. One of Zanzil's flunkies at the Ruins of Aboraz must have it on him. Head east, to the coast of the Cape, and snatch it for me!
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain Zanzil's Formulation from one of Zanzil's followers in the Ruins of Aboraz.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did he use shimmerweed? I'm guessing he used shimmerweed.$b$bNo wait... amberseeds! It's gotta be amberseeds.
QuestData.RewardText: This is fascinating! Just think of all the applications!$b$bThanks again, $n. Remember, if you ever need anything mixed for you... and I mean ANYTHING... you can always ask The Flask.
